column5: Have a good one! Call me sometime this weekend to figure out when and where to meet up for that auger.
Holy crap he's another year older? lol happy birthday
Oy vey.....  No doubt another new floral/neon/Hawiian shirt to hurt my hangover eyes.....   Cheers my friend.
Hope the day was full of lemons Joe!!
Yep, I was thinking the same thing...lemon droppies for everyone! You be well, Joe.
Happy Birthday ya old fart  Hope you have a good one.  Joey
Another birthday Joe? Just what were we celebrating last September anyway?
Happy belated Birthday Joe!  Hope the day was filled with everything you love and all the drops you could handle
Well...... since Joe hasnt replied to this thread, one can only assume that he was into the lemon drops early and heavy. LOL
Thanks everyone! My wife literally dragged me to see "Wicked" on Saturday night... and no, unfortunately, no lemons were hurt all weekend... but a good time was had. Thanks again all, HH
Happy belated HH, glad to hear you had a goodun !!
Happy Birthday! The show must've been 'Wicked' with hemostat in hand  All the best.
Sorry I am a day late hope it was a good one.   Art
